skill.5: ["Potential","Analyzing","Product knowledge","Retail","Motivate","Business development","Brand awareness","Client relationship management","Skillful","Customer satisfaction","Sales growth","Analysis","Retail sales","Organizational","Developing","Profitability","Initiative","Revenue growth","Development","B2b","Operations","Sales","Consistent","Presentation","B2c","Improvement","Channel management","Awareness","Pipeline","Motivating","Marketing"]

description.9465:
SO-CA(Sales Officer- Current Account)

  • It’s a proper field job where candidate is responsible to acquire new accounts from the open market. The same accounts are further managed by the RMs.
  • They report to the Branch Sales Manager.
  • CTC limit- 5- 7 LPA
  • This is a role we have been asked to work on for Mumbai location only for which the drive is scheduled don 26th June. Hence, this is our chance to get some quick closure. Make the most of it.
